title: nullama
author: nullama
content: Pez dispensers have been discussed in this forum more than a decade ago:Quote from: bitcoinminer on June 23, 2011, 03:31:32 AMeBay started off as a way for the guy's wife to collect Pez dispensers, and look at what a clusterfuck THAT has turned into.We've now come full circle with this limited edition Bitcoin Pez Dispenser for sale on eBay: https://www.ebay.com/itm/145654566941There are only 30,000 units made.Here are the details of this collectible:QuoteThis Limited Edition Bitcoin PEZ is one of a single production run of 30,000 dispensers. This exclusive dispenser is limited in distribution channels and will not be found in retail stores like ordinary PEZ. The puck dispenser has the Bitcoin cryptocurrency logo on it and comes on a matching orange stem. The dispenser comes on a Bitcoin card marked with the limited edition emblem from PEZ Candy. The back of the card has the Bitcoin logo and says "Eat Candy. Buy Bitcoin." This dispenser will be popular among PEZ collectors and cryptocurrency enthusiasts. The Bitcoin PEZ dispenser comes on a card with three packs of orange PEZ candy.You don't need to HODL this PEZ Dispenser like you would your actual Bitcoin...or do you?• Limited Edition: Only 30,000 Dispensers Made• Bitcoin Themed PEZ Candy Dispenser• A Must-have for any Bitcoin or Crypto enthusiast• Includes Three Candy Refills. Manufactured by PEZ Candy, Inc. in the United States of America.If you don't like eBay for some reason, you can gran one from Walmart as well:https://www.walmart.com/ip/Bitcoin-PEZ-Dispenser-with-Candy-LIMITED-EDITION/1915338112

comments.author: OgNasty
comments.body: I grabbed one from Walmart a few months ago. The price was right but it did arrive pretty dented so as a collector’s item that was a bit disappointing. I’m surprised these are still available if they’re limited. There’s a good topic about it in the collectibles section somewhere.

comments.author: Reatim
comments.body: This is such a good product  ; i’m plenty surprised to see how cheap it is considering it is a collectible itemI also have some goods that have bitcoin as a design but i am pretty sure it’s not rare still it’s quite a fun thing to haveIf only ebay directly ships to my country, i would have gotten this but the expensive fees prevents me from doing so Happy collecting!

comments.author: Doan9269
comments.body: I never thought about this that such could exist and not even on ebay anyway, but this sounds good and impressive seeing that bitcoin is been painted over all the online platforms and some desirable products like this, this information will help many to know, and this as well is now available after a long time they might have heard about it, there should be more online malls that may have this same product as ebay and walmart do.

comments.author: DaveF
comments.body: There was a discussion about this last year: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5446091.0I also raffled one off: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5450037But yes, it's an interesting collectable. Probably have another couple of them buried in storage. Makes you wonder....how long will the actual Pez last.-Dave

comments.author: HideYourKeys
comments.body: Is it for the US only?
